title: Tangled Reins
description: A traditional regency romance from a best-selling author - Content with her humdrum life, Miss Dorothea Darent has no intention of marrying. She knows that her unfashionable curves and outspoken ways make her a disastrous match for any gentleman of the ton. The scandalous Marquis of Hazelmere is equally intent on remaining single – but when he encounters Dorothea, he’s entranced. He doesn’t expect Dorothea's unconventional charm to take society by storm . . . but when the lady is surrounded by suitors, the confirmed rake must fight for his beautiful prize! This is a first time regular print hardcover previously available in a mass market edition.
author: Stephanie Laurens
